title: Tuesday Post Show (5-4-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (5-4-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Raymundo about why he didn’t take the NFL announcer job after he gets called out in a voicemail that was left for us last night. Bobby talks about a list of celebrity couples from the 2000’s that you probably don’t remember and the divorce of Bill and Melinda Gates. Plus the guy who broke a push up world record. Bobby also gives an update on if his show on Nat Geo (Breaking Bobby Bones) could get a 2nd season even before it airs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby talks to Raymundo about why he didn’t take the NFL announcer job after he gets called out in a voicemail that was left for us last night. Bobby talks about a list of celebrity couples from the 2000’s that you probably don’t remember and the divorce of Bill and Melinda Gates. Plus the guy who broke a push up world record. Bobby also gives an update on if his show on Nat Geo (Breaking Bobby Bones) could get a 2nd season even before it airs.
